channel.title: pictures on Master 0xCcC
channel.description: Recent content in pictures on Master 0xCcC

item.title: Stego tools (for pictures)
item.description: Cheatsheet - Stego tools for pictures Stegoveritas Stegoveritas can be found here : https://github.com/bannsec/stegoVeritas Create several altered images (contrast/colors/brightness) Run with common options : $ stegoveritas -exif -meta -xmp -carve -imageTransform -BruteLSB -extractLSB -trailing massacre.png Steghide Available in most of distro's repos. Common run : steghide extract -sf file.jpg Stegcracker Stegcracker can be found here : https://github.com/Paradoxis/StegCracker Performs a steghide bruteforce : stegcracker file.jpg /usr/share/wordlist/rockyou.txt
